data.name: FPV.SkyDive - Midnight Airport
data.detailed_description:
FPV.SkyDive - Midnight Airport allows you to experience FPV night flying around an illuminated airport. Fly and improve your skills inside terminals, hangars and even airplanes.

DLC includes:
- New map
- Freestyle option
- 4 racing tracks
data.about_the_game:
FPV.SkyDive - Midnight Airport allows you to experience FPV night flying around an illuminated airport. Fly and improve your skills inside terminals, hangars and even airplanes.

DLC includes:
- New map
- Freestyle option
- 4 racing tracks
data.short_description: FPV.SkyDive - Midnight Airport allows you to experience FPV night flying around an illuminated airport. Fly and improve your skills inside terminals, hangars and even airplanes. DLC includes: - New map - Freestyle option - 4 racing tracks

fullgame.name: FPV.SkyDive : FPV Drone Racing & Freestyle Simulator

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (7,8,10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (7,8,10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.

  • Processor: 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: 3.8 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Preferably a transmitter radio is wanted for best flying experience. Graphic settings are changeable to suit lower end devices.
